HighTemperature.name: HighTemperature
HighTemperature.description: The event sends ON when high temperatures are detected that could jeopardize the integrity of the Observatory's components. temperature => 40ºCelsius

LowTemperature.name: LowTemperature
LowTemperature.description: The event sends ON when low temperatures are detected that could jeopardize the integrity of the Observatory's components. temperature = <0ºCelsius

Rain.name: Rain
Rain.description: The event sends ON when rain is detected and the Observatory should be closed.

StrongWind.name: StrongWind
StrongWind.description: The event sends ON when strong wind is detected and the Observatory should be closed.
